page.title: 19RECREATION cont'd
page.content: The facilities of the leisure centre include 2 outside all-weather tennis courts, 5-a-side football, 2 cricket practice nets, main activities hall, changing rooms, fitness rooms and a hot snack bar and drinks bar. The activities include basket-ball, netball, judo, badminton, roller-skating, weight-lifting, table-tennis and an enormous inflateable castle. To cater for all ages the centre has started an over-fifties club, a 7-11 year group and a 11-15 year group. It is open 7 days a week and is in regular use. What is urgently needed now is a swimming pool!
